sections.MISSION:
1st Squadron, 2d Cavalry Regiment conducts M4/M249 Qualifications on 29-30MAY25 at RG 202A to qualify and maintain proficiency on the M4/M249.
M4/M249 QUALIFICATION: RNG 114 (29-30MAY25)
N
COMMANDERS
sections.PURPOSE: of this range is to provide Soldiers an opportunity to conduct a zero and qualification on the M4 and M249, while ensuring unit readiness and preparation for future operations.​
sections.END STATE:
Soldiers conduct refresher training on their primary weapon system and successfully qualify on Table VI.
TRAINING OBJECTIVES:
1.) Conduct M4/M249 PMI
2.) Conduct Zero and M4/M249 Table V
3.) Conduct M4/M249 Table VI
4.) Retrain and Refire as Needed
5.) Every Attending Soldier Qualifies
